keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce Swiss style referendum policy at all levels of Government, national, regional and local, giving people a real voice in the running of this country.
Deregulate business from the unnecessary 'One size fits all' EU regulations and directives.

issues.brexitEurope: Deregulate business from the unnecessary 'One size fits all' EU regulations and directives.
issues.governance: Introduce Swiss style referendum policy at all levels of Government, national, regional and local.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a Retired Army Officer who joined the Royal Engineers as a boy soldier, was promoted through the ranks eventually being commissioned. I served in various parts of the world and met and worked with a wide variety of people. I believe in personal responsibility and freedom of choice.

images.caption: Image of Peter Adams, the candidate for UKIP in the constituency of Kirkcaldy and Cowdenbeath.
